name: Essence//Structure
description:
Essence//Structure is an entry to the HauntedPS1 Summer of Shivers GameJam.

Here you'll be thrown into a place named the Structure. You control an unknown Entity. You are free to roam around and collect Essence, a ressource that you'll need to fly around and move with great agility and speed.  Learn more about the Structure by searching memories of the place, and get one of the two endings possibles.

The game controls like a light 3D platformer, and is optimized for gamepad support. 

Code, Visuals, Sounds by me. English text correction by Clément Grouzard. Font used by TypodermicsFonts.

Controls

gamepad (and keyboard) :

Select (G key) = respawn to the last checkpoint activated

left stick (wasd keys) = move

right stick (mouse) = camera

A or B (space key) = jump (press twice to double jump, hold longer for higher jump)

X (left click) = dash

R1 (right click) = glide (in air and you need Essence for that)

R2 or Y (E key) = Dive (while in air) => just after you landed your dive, press jump to ultra jump

L2 (Shift key) = run (run + dash = super dash that cost Essence)

Start (Tab key) = pause

Patch 1.1 :
